Name: 一本橋ワタル
About the game: This is a bicycle trial game in which the player must ride a bicycle across a bridge in the sky. The road is never smooth, and there are many detours and obstacles in your way. Overcome every obstacle and ride to the goal. What's this? Ride a bicycle across a single bridge in the sky. In addition to moving forward and backward and jumping, you can lift the front and rear wheels. You must overcome obstacles in the course to reach the goal on the other side of the river. If you deviate from the course, you will fall into the abyss. Over 30 different courses! In random mode, the courses are almost endless! Course editor Original course data can be created by determining the course trajectory. Course data will be saved in the application server, so courses created by other players will also appear.
